cinnamon.engine.object

Class ImageComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.system.ComponentManager.Component
      • cinnamon.engine.object.ImageComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Copier<ComponentManager.Component>, Identifiable, ObservablePosition<ImageComponent>, ObservableRotation<ImageComponent>, ObservableSize<ImageComponent>, Partitionable<Bounds>, Position, Resizable, Rotation, Size

    public final class ImageComponent
extends ComponentManager.Component
implements ObservablePosition<ImageComponent>, ObservableSize<ImageComponent>, ObservableRotation<ImageComponent>, Resizable, Partitionable<Bounds>, Drawable

    An ImageComponent represents the visual aspect of a GameObjectManager.GObject. In order to be drawn, each GObject holds a reference to a personal ImageComponent that holds drawing information such as color tinting, transparency value, and TextureManager.Texture choice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.ObservablePosition

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()

        Checks if the image should be visible.

        This method returns true if isInvisible() returns false and transparency is non-zero. Note that the image may, in practice, not necessarily be visible due to other factors such as size or color.

        Returns:
        true if the image should be drawn.
